WorkPlace.Name: SEMCO MARITIME A/S
WorkPlace.OrganizationDescription: Dedicated to the energy sector, Semco Maritime is an international contracting and engineering company. For more than 30 years we have been facilitating design, fabrication, service and maintenance of our customers’ assets, providing comprehensive project management across all phases of energy projects. Semco Maritime is an international company with branches in Denmark, Norway, UK, UAE, Singapore, Vietnam, Central America and USA.

HiringOrg.Name: SEMCO MARITIME A/S
HiringOrg.OrganizationDescription: Dedicated to the energy sector, Semco Maritime is an international contracting and engineering company. For more than 30 years we have been facilitating design, fabrication, service and maintenance of our customers’ assets, providing comprehensive project management across all phases of energy projects. Semco Maritime is an international company with branches in Denmark, Norway, UK, UAE, Singapore, Vietnam, Central America and USA.

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you highly skilled in the use of CAD and do you wish to put that into use in a position where you get to be our dedicated specialist and take ownership of the processes? Do you possess an innovative mindset and enjoy optimizing and ensuring efficiency?

Then we have the opportunity for you!

Your position 

You will join our highly skilled and passionate 3D Design Team in our Renewables Division. We are the largest provider of Offshore Substations for renewable windfarms, and we are currently working on several large projects.

When we work on constructing our large offshore substations, we make use of CAD programs to design the layout and optimizing the design itself.

We are currently working on optimizing our use of CAD which will enable the development, modification, and optimization of the design process. This is where you come in!

Your tasks & responsibilities 

As our new CAD Specialist Engineer you will primarily work on optimizing our use of CAD, developing our models and therefore assist in making more accurate representations of our models and modifying them easily to improve design quality.

Your tasks will include but are not limited to:

  • Creating and maintaining a database of Semco Specific specs for mechanical parts in use on Offshore EPC plant Designs
  • Managing the administration and being the owner of the setup within our CAD-software
  • Ensuring consistency and alignment across the layout designs
  • Setting up all our CAD projects in use by multiple people on a shared common server available for the people working on them
  • Participating in the layout design phase of our many projects with our other CAD designers

Your profile & qualifications 

You are someone who is passionate about working with CAD and the optimization processes related to it. You preferably have experience in managing processes related to CAD and optimization and development of CAD tools.

As a person you are known as someone who works to ensure that the details are correct and that the workflow is aligned across the team.

To succeed in this position, we expect that you:

  • Possess extensive experience in the use of CAD
  • Preferably have a background from the mechanical engineering field
  • Have experience from working on multi-discipline engineering projects
  • Are fluent in English, written and spoken

Welcome to Semco Maritime 

We offer you an interesting and challenging job in an international organization, where we strive to provide innovative and sustainable solutions globally. You will get the unique opportunity to work in an environment characterized by dedication, passion and ambition. 

You may choose to work either from our location in Esbjerg, Denmark or in Gdynia, Poland.

We conduct our interviews on an ongoing basis, so if you are interested, you must submit your application as soon as possible via the link on the page:

https://semcomaritime.career.emply.com/ad/cad-specialist/azmgp1/e

If you have any questions, you are welcome to contact Torben Vestergaard on +45 79 16 61 50. 

We look forward to hearing from you!

 

Semco Maritime is an international engineering and contracting company dedicated to projects in the energy sector. For 40 years, we have been facilitating design, fabrication, service and maintenance of our customers’ assets, providing comprehensive project management across all phases of energy projects. From turnkey engineering solutions to outsourcing of manpower and delivery of components, systems and solutions – we make sure our customers and partners in the energy sector experience safe and cost-efficient solutions. Semco Maritime has approx. 1,700 employees and branches in Denmark, Norway, United Kingdom, Germany, Singapore and the US.

For further information, please see www.semcomaritime.com
